name: drabness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being boring, especially in appearance, or of having little colour and excitement: It's the unrelieved drabness of big industrial cities that depresses me. Thousands of women chose to dress with similar drabness out of homage to Garbo. Synonyms
dreariness disapproving
dryness (BEING BORING)
dullness (LACK OF INTEREST)
monotony
tediousnessSee
